outputs.output_descr:
PPG are being requested to undertake a series of activities vital for the development of the project's design, including the collection of key baseline information, detailed stakeholder analysis, definition of specific strategies to implement during the Full Project and identifcation of the most appropriate pilot sites to implement the tools and approaches developed throught the project.
PPG funds will be used for: (i) collection of baseline ecological information and identification of wetland indicators for ongoing ecological monitoring; (ii) detailed threat and barrier analysis; (iii) analysis of protected area management effectiveness; (iv) stakeholder analysis, consultations and capacity assessment; (v) feasibility assessment of potential financing mechanisms; and (vi) development of feasibility analysis, budget and key project design elements.

project_descr: Conservation, sustainable use of biodiversity and maintenance of ecosystem services of internationally important protected wetlands.
